profilePage.helmetDescription: Manage your WIIBEC profile. Edit your personal information and password.
profilePage.title: My Profile
profilePage.subtitle: Manage your personal and security information
profilePage.passwordLengthError: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
profilePage.passwordUpdatedSuccess: Your password has been changed successfully.
profilePage.loadingError: Could not load profile. Please try again.

dashboardPage.helmetDescription: Your WIIBEC personal space. Track your donations, view your profile, and see your impact on youth financial education.
dashboardPage.thankYou: Thank you for supporting youth financial education with WIIBEC
dashboardPage.paymentSuccessDescription: Your donation has been received. Thank you for your support!

donationPromptCard.title: Support our cause
donationPromptCard.description: Every donation, big or small, helps us continue our mission of financial education for young people.

donatePage.helmetDescription: Support our mission of financial education for young people. Every donation counts.
donatePage.title: Support our mission
donatePage.subtitle: Your generosity drives our impact.
donatePage.loginError: Please log in to make a donation.

paymentSuccessPage.verifyingDesc: Please wait, we are confirming your donation and generating your receipt.
paymentSuccessPage.successDesc: Your donation of {{amount}} has been successfully processed.
paymentSuccessPage.receiptInfo: A detailed receipt has been generated and is now available in your dashboard.
paymentSuccessPage.errorDesc: We could not verify your payment. Please contact support if the problem persists.
paymentSuccessPage.paymentVerifiedDesc: Your donation has been successfully recorded.
